thread.title: Good hotel with signs of ageing
thread.title_full: Good hotel with signs of ageing - Review of Pullman Paris Centre - Bercy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Karsten K
title: Good hotel with signs of ageing
text:
Business hotel located in a fairly industrial area. Generally good, although there are some signs of ageing, for example in the bathroom. The reception service was friendly and fast. Everything worked well. The free Wifi was OK. I skipped the breakfast as it was an extra â‚¬26. Overall, this hotel was not cheap. I only used it because I was there for business in the local area.
